    "The total units of water used for producing liquid and foam hand sanitizers must not exceed the total water available",
    "The total units of alcohol used for producing liquid and foam hand sanitizers must not exceed the total alcohol available",

    "The number of liquid hand sanitizers produced must be non-negative",
